text.eng: Welcome to Sqr.Island![b] Something has turned the peaceful inhabitants of this beautiful land insane, making them attack everyone and everything![b] There must be a source for this evil somewhere on the Island. [b] Go and save them, but be careful![b] You can move with the DPad, jump with the B button and skip textboxes like this one by pressing Start.[b] You may also one day learn to shoot with X.
